statements: SELECT * FROM players
SELECT name, age FROM players WHERE nationality='USA'
SELECT name, age FROM players ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT position, COUNT(*) AS num_players FROM players GROUP BY position
SELECT player_id, name, nationality FROM players WHERE age >= 25
SELECT * FROM players WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM players WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT player_id, position FROM players WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 30
SELECT DISTINCT nationality FROM players ORDER BY nationality
SELECT * FROM players WHERE position IN ('Forward', 'Midfielder')
SELECT id, name, age, position, nationality FROM players;
SELECT name, position FROM players WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE nationality='Brazil';
SELECT coach_name, team_name FROM teams WHERE established_year > 2000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_players FROM players;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, position FROM players WHERE nationality = 'Brazil' ORDER BY position ASC;
SELECT team_name, established_year FROM teams WHERE established_year < 2000 ORDER BY established_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM players JOIN teams ON players.id = teams.id WHERE teams.coach_name = 'Alex Ferguson';
SELECT * FROM players WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, position FROM players ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE country = 'Spain'
SELECT id, name FROM teams WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT team1_id, team2_id, date FROM matches
SELECT name, age FROM players WHERE nationality='Brazil' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE country='Spain';
SELECT id, name, country FROM teams ORDER BY country;
SELECT p.name, p.position, t.name AS team_name FROM players p JOIN teams t ON p.id = t.id WHERE p.age > 25;
SELECT m.id AS match_id, t1.name AS team1_name, t2.name AS team2_name, m.date FROM matches m JOIN teams t1 ON m.team1_id = t1.id JOIN teams t2 ON m.team2_id = t2.id ORDER BY m.date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM player_information;
SELECT player_id, name, age FROM player_information WHERE age > 25;
SELECT name, position FROM player_information WHERE nationality = 'Brazil';
SELECT * FROM team_information ORDER BY established_year DESC;
SELECT player_id, games_played, goals_scored, assists FROM player_stats WHERE assists > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_information
SELECT name, age, position FROM player_information WHERE age > 25
SELECT player_id, name, position, nationality FROM player_information WHERE nationality = 'Brazil'
SELECT team_name, established_year FROM team_information ORDER BY established_year DESC
SELECT player_id, games_played, goals_scored FROM player_stats WHERE goals_scored > 10
SELECT * FROM players ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT id, name, position FROM players WHERE nationality='Brazil';
SELECT name, age FROM players WHERE position='Midfielder' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM teams WHERE country='Spain' AND city='Barcelona';
SELECT name, goals, assists FROM players INNER JOIN stats ON players.id = stats.player_id WHERE goals > 5 ORDER BY assists DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, position FROM players WHERE nationality = 'Spain';
SELECT id, name FROM teams WHERE country = 'Germany' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT player_id, injury_type, recovery_time FROM injuries WHERE injury_type = 'Hamstring' LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.name, s.goals, s.assists, s.yellow_cards FROM players p INNER JOIN stats s ON p.id = s.player_id WHERE s.red_cards > 2;
